value.title: Set Up Power BI Data Gateway to Connect On-Premise Data Sources
value.excerpt: During this session, we will be discussing about how we can install Standard Data Gateway to connect with On-Premise Data sources like SQL Server.  In this session, we have taken an example of On-Premise SQL Server Database. I will explain step by step procedure to install a Gateway and then how we can

value.title: Show Total in Stacked Bar and Column Chart in Power BI
value.excerpt: During this video, we will learn how we can show total value in a stacked bar chart and stacked column chart in Power BI. value.title: Sort a table using Multiple Columns in Power BI | Multi Column Sort in Power  BI
value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI. value.title: Handling deletes within Incremental Refresh in Power BI

value.title: How to use the Power BI Aggregations Feature
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam sits down with Christian Wade to discuss how to use the Power BI Aggregations feature. This video will show you the clicks to get to the clicky clicky draggy droppy awesomeness when working with big data, or even massive data.   Christian Wade on Twitter - @_christianWade  LET'S CONNECT!

value.title: No Calendar Table? How to add Fiscal Month and Sort in Power BI?

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Visualizing Data
value.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Now that you have data, Patrick walks you through how to build a matrix visual within the report.
